HomePage.bannerText: Our advanced questionnaire matches you with the optimal medication based on your unique health profile.

o1.title: Create Your Profile
o1.description: Register securely and provide basic health information to get started.

o2.title: Complete Our Questionnaire
o2.description: Answer our detailed health assessment developed by medical experts.

o3.title: Get Your Recommendation
o3.description: Receive your personalized pill recommendation within minutes.

AboutSection.p1: We're a team of medical professionals and data scientists committed to improving medication adherence and outcomes through personalized recommendations.
AboutSection.p2: Our proprietary algorithm analyzes hundreds of data points to match patients with the medication most likely to be effective for their specific condition and physiology.
AboutSection.p3: Our recommendations are based on peer-reviewed research

CTASection.h2: Ready to find your Perfect Match?
CTASection.p: Take our 5-minute questionnaire and receive your personalized recommendation today.

questions.q6_label: Do you currently have any known pre-existing conditions?
questions.q7_label: Are you currently taking other medications?
questions.q8_label: Do you have any allergies or intolerances?
questions.q10_label: Do you have upcoming surgery or recently had surgery?
questions.q11_label: What is the name of your prescribed medication?
questions.q12_label: Why was this medication prescribed to you?
questions.q13_label: How often do you take this medication?
questions.q15_label: Do you take medication before, during or after meals?
questions.q16_label: Do you have difficulty swallowing the tablets?
questions.q17_label: Have you noticed any side effects since taking this medication?
questions.q18_label: Has your general condition improved since taking this medication?
questions.q19_label: Have you ever forgotten to take your medication?
